definition: Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Schroeder also focused on Buffett's fear of mortality.
sentences.chinese: 施羅德還提到了巴菲特對死亡的恐懼。

sentences.english: Thus, Schroeder's New Middle of the Road Policy becomes outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 施羅德的“新中派政策”因此而格外引人注目。
研究證實了施羅德的觀點。

sentences.english: Schroeder fully agreed with Wen's proposals on bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 施羅德完全贊同溫家寶對兩國關係所提的建議。

sentences.english: Schroeder said that the German government attaches great importance to developing all-round cooperation with China.
sentences.chinese: 施羅德表示，德國政府高度重視加強對華全面合作。

sentences.english: But Schroeder believes Buffett also takes advantage of his "bathtub" memory.
sentences.chinese: 施羅德覺得他很好地利用了自己像浴缸一樣的記憶力。

sentences.english: Schroeder extended his warm welcome to Wen for his official visit to Germany.
sentences.chinese: 施羅德熱烈歡迎溫家寶對德國進行正式訪問。

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Ji2 tuan2

definition: Nelson or Nillson (name)/Horatio Nelson (1758-1805), British naval hero
